title: Why Do I Play Against High Gold - Low Plats in Norms?
body: In ranked I get high silver to low gold but in norms I get high gold to low plat? How does it work?

replies.body: Ranked MMR and Norms MMR is different. There are some numbers involved also but its to hard to explain.

Yeah, it rubs me the wrong way when I ask people what rank they are and they tell me their rank for Normal queue. Then they proceed to tell me it's the same. Then I proceed to check and they're Platinum in Normal and Silver V in Ranked.

People, most people take the piss in Norms. It's where people experiment or learn Champs.
Am silver 4 atm and literally around a game ago i went up against a low diamond like lmao wtf
